descr: Person asked me what is special about the glasses, I explained to him. Noticed how funny it was to me that it happened  not even 5 minutes after I received the glasses
future_use: Only confirmed the fact that I'll be aware people are looking

descr: [in lecture hall before class started]  It was nice to see another student with the same glasses, and she had entered first, so people were "ready" to see me, I felt more at ease and less awkward than I expected I would. It was enjoyable also to share a moment with her and laugh
future_use: Makes me feel more at ease with wearing the glasses in lectures

descr: I am studying (with laptop and writing on paper). I took the glasses of momentarily to clean them and I must say, even though the lenses aren't tinted, my subjective experience is that the environment looks ever so slightly darker with them.  I will turn on my desk lamp but I probably wouldn't have done it if I had no glasses
